heroTitle: Organize Your Thoughts, Build Your Knowledge
heroText: Discover premium Zettelkasten products designed to elevate your note-taking experience.
aboutText: We are passionate about helping you capture, organize, and connect your ideas. Zettelkasten Store is your one-stop destination for everything Zettelkasten.
contactDescription: Reach out for support with password resets, returns, or any other issues. Our team is here to help.
mission: Contact us today for support, returns, or just to say thanks! We're looking forward to being your one stop Zettelkasten Shop! If you find an error on the website please let us know in the contact form below. This website is currently a work in progress and is part of a bigger picture. By creating a unified Zettelkasten Shop, I'm reducing the cognitive resistance and point of entry for new beginners and experts alike in the fields of research, writing, learning, self-development, and more!
